EmailTemplate.name: 202002_Customer_Connect_Newsletter.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Your February issue of Customer Connect is here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sun Never Sets on Honeywell Technical Support Technical support is all about creating a great customer experience – every time. Honeywell is working to provide business aviation customers with better, faster, more responsive service, while still maintaining the personal touch that has been so much a part of Honeywell’s character over the years. Read More. Read More >> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/11/sun-never-sets-on-honeywell-technical-support]]> You asked, we answered. Here are the most commonly asked questions from customers. There are a quite a few tasks you can accomplish on the Honeywell Aerospace website from online ordering, database downloads, researching in the Technical Knowledge Center, locating a channel partner or requesting technical support from ATS. You might be thinking, where do I begin? We curated the most commonly asked questions from customers and created a series of articles answering your questions. Read More >> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics]]> TECH VIDEO OF THE MONTH Technical Knowledge Center <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/videos/eei-install-and-setup?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
UPCOMING EVENTS Monterrey <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/03/monterrey-operator-conference?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Santiago <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/04/santiago-operator-conference?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Dallas <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/04/dallas-operator-conference?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]> Houston <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/04/houston-operator-conference?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=newsletter]]>
